sentences.en: A mongrel dog is prowling aimlessly along the canal bank.
sentences.cn: 一条笨狗无目的地在运河岸上闲逛.

sentences.en: Accidentally , my Dachshund Basset Hound gave birth to a mongrel.
sentences.cn: 显然，我的猎犬生了一只杂种狗。

sentences.en: Can summon mongrel things that he can cast locust swarm on, which buffs their damage.
sentences.cn: 可以召唤也会蝗群法术的魔物以增加本身的伤害.

sentences.en: English is a mongrel language that keeps its vitality by absorbing new words, uses and expression _ rs.
sentences.cn: 英语是一种杂交语言,一直靠吸收新词 、 新用法和新含义来保持其生命力.

sentences.en: Instead, a rusty trawler lies on its side on the forecourt, which the workmen eye as though a mongrel dog.
sentences.cn: 取而代之的是一条锈迹斑斑的拖网渔船，活像只一条腿歪在地上的杂种狗。

sentences.en: Josie: That's not surprising because it's not a thoroughbred, it's a mongrel.
sentences.cn: 卓喜: 那不奇怪啊,因为它不是纯种狗, 是混种的.

sentences.en: Right, you're that little mongrel I fetch here sometimes.
sentences.cn: 哦,对了, 你就是那个小屁孩我见过你几次.

sentences.en: The English word " television " is a mongrel because " tele " comes from Greek and " vision " from Latin.
sentences.cn: 英语 television 是个语源混杂的词,因为 tele 来自希腊文,vision来自拉丁文.

sentences.en: The Mongrel Club will also submit our views to AFCD and concern groups attending the meeting.
sentences.cn: 本会亦将以唐狗会名义,向渔护署及与会团体提交意见.

sentences.en: The only reason of the attack - he’s a mongrel.
sentences.cn: 那次攻击的唯一原因是——他是个混血儿。

trans.tran_en: a dog that is a mix of several different breeds
